doc.field: Records of Athletics Programs at New York University
Records of Athletics Programs at New York University

This series is comprised of materials relating to the NYU Olympic athletes from 1904-1988, including rosters and biographies of these athletes as well as material from a 1988 exhibition on NYU athletes who have competed in the Olympics.
NYU athletes have been competing in the Olympics since 1904. Between that year and 1988, 19 athletes from NYU have won a total of 28 medals.
Fencing and track have generated the most Olympians from NYU. In 1988 an exhibition was created to highlight the successes of NYU's Olympic athletes.
Records of Athletics Programs at New York University
